name: North End (Waterfront area)  CLOSE TO MGH & SUBWAY
description:
Chic furnished studio apartment is located on Waterfront & North End. Close (10 min walk) to Mass General Hospital, Mass Eye & Ear, TD Boston Garden and Mass Transit station. One block to Hanover Street restaurants, shops & cafes. Easy walk (5 min) to Fanieul Hall Marketplace, City Hall and Haymarket farmers market. Take the "T" to Back Bay neighborhood, including Northeastern University, Berklee Univ or into Cambridge Ma.

The space
Waterfront Studio apt on Commercial St. Totally renovated with granite, stainless steel appliances, Queen Murphy Bed, includes utilities, A/C, WI-FI, Cable TV, linens, towels, cooking pots/pans/utensils, breakfast bar workspace.

30 Day Min. Rental

Guest access
Access to the entire Apartment
